name: Plan to Find Random Person's Opinion on Animal Description
plan_description: This plan retrieves an animal description based on given IDs and determines a random person's opinion on it.
questions: What is the opinion of a random person on the animal with ID 0 and color ID 1?

depends.name: Get Animal Name by ID
depends.plan_description: Retrieve the animal name using the provided animal ID.

functions.name: extra.TestDag.get_animal_name_by_id
functions.description: Select an animal by id for ids 0 to 4

depends.name: Get Color Name by ID
depends.plan_description: Retrieve the color name using the provided color ID.

functions.name: extra.TestDag.get_color_name_by_id
functions.description: Select the color by id for ids 0 to 4

depends.name: Get Animal Description
depends.plan_description: Get a full description of the animal using the animal name and color name.

functions.name: extra.TestDag.get_animal_description
functions.description: Pass in the animal name and color name to get a full description

depends.name: Determine Random Person's Opinion
depends.plan_description: Find out a random person's opinion on the animal description.

functions.name: extra.TestDag.determine_random_persons_opinion_of_animal
functions.description: Given a person and an animal description that you found
